trending_videos.title: State of Play | February 12, 2026 [English Subtitles]
trending_videos.description:
Tune in live this Thursday for 60+ minutes of news, gameplay updates, and announcements from game studios across the globe. February's State of Play will spotlight eye-catching third-party and indie games headed to PS5, along with the latest from teams at PlayStation Studios.

State of Play broadcasts live February 12 at 2pm PT / 5pm ET / 11pm CEST | February 13 at 7am JST on YouTube and Twitch, and will be broadcast in English with Japanese subtitles also available. We‚Äôll see you then!

Regarding co-streaming and video-on-demand (VOD)

Please note that this broadcast may include copyrighted content (e.g. licensed music) that PlayStation does not control. We welcome and celebrate our amazing co-streamers and creators, but licensing agreements outside our control could interfere with co-streams or VOD archives of this broadcast. If you‚Äôre planning to save this broadcast as a VOD to create recap videos, or to repost clips or segments from the show, we advise omitting any copyrighted musi

trending_videos.title: Resident Evil Requiem - 4th Trailer
trending_videos.description:
Requiem for the dead. Nightmare for the living.

Resident Evil Requiem is now available for pre-order! Experience terrifying survival horror with FBI analyst Grace Ashcroft, and dive into pulse-pounding action with legendary agent Leon S. Kennedy. Both of their journeys and unique gameplay styles intertwine into a heart-stopping, emotional experience that will chill you to your core.
 
A new era of survival horror begins when Resident Evil Requiem launches February 27, 2026 for PlayStation¬Æ5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, Steam, Epic Games Store and GeForce NOW.

Pre-order: https://www.residentevil.com/requiem/en-us/products

For more official news and updates, follow us on:
https://www.residentevil.com/requiem
https://twitter.com/re_games 
http://www.facebook.com/residentevil 
https://www.instagram.com/re_games

trending_videos.title: Remember the Titans
trending_videos.description: In Virginia, high school football is a way of life, an institution revered, each game celebrated more lavishly than Christmas, each playoff distinguished more grandly than any national holiday. And with such recognition, comes powerful emotions. In 1971 high school football was everything to the people of Alexandria. But when the local school board was forced to integrate an all black school with an all white school, the very foundation of football's great tradition was put to the test.

insights.entertainment_dominance: Entertainment-related content, particularly trailers and teasers, are dominating the trending list, indicating high audience interest in upcoming releases.
insights.gaming_trend: Gaming content, both live gameplay and game trailers, is highly popular, reflecting a strong market for interactive content and live streaming.
insights.event_engagement: State of Play events draw significant attention, suggesting opportunities for real-time engagement and announcement-based content strategies.
insights.nostalgia_factor: Content tapping into nostalgia, such as 'Remember the Titans', can successfully engage audiences, indicating a trend towards revisiting classic themes or properties.

Prime Video.impact: Prime Video's engagement with authentic and stylistic content like 'Spider-Noir' showcases the potential of niche cinematic experiences.

Netflix.impact: Netflix continues to leverage established franchises like 'Bridgerton' for sustained audience engagement and series branding.

HutchMF & NICKMERCS.impact: Collaborative live streams are effective in reaching wider gaming communities, highlighting the value of influencer partnerships.

Jynxzi.impact: Unique gaming content like trolling or challenges (Rocket League) can capture niche audiences seeking humor and novelty.

emerging_trends.cross-platform releases: The intersection of gaming and entertainment, such as game adaptations and cinematic trailers, offers a lucrative market for cross-promotion.
emerging_trends.live streaming potential: The success of live gameplay streams suggests growth opportunities in interactive and real-time content formats.

content_strategy_recommendations.leverage_nostalgia: Consider producing content that taps into classic themes or reboots, as nostalgia can be a powerful engagement driver.
content_strategy_recommendations.capitalize_on_trailer_releases: Early teasers and trailers for upcoming releases should be strategically timed and marketed to maximize anticipation and audience reach.

analysis.note: Transcript analysis is more detailed, metadata analysis provides broader trends
